short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click SEO Analysis Tool, made for Non-SEOs by SEOs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Powered by SEO practitioners, we aim to make SEO simple again!

Our free SEO analysis tool provides instant on-page SEO audit for everyone - even the most novice of users can audit and analyze any website. Whether you're a webmaster, digital marketer or SEO, this extension instantly identifies, highlights errors and recommend on-page SEO fixes. 

Analyze your on-page SEO in just one click and get suggestions to improve on your site SEO using our SEO Audit Tool which is free! It is an easy-to-use tool that you can use any time to optimize your web page in a few steps

It includes highly detailed actionable insight into the key elements on your website so that you are able to rank higher on search engines like Google, Yahoo, Bing and etc.

Key Elements for On-Page SEO Audit:
 
Page Info
- Title Tag
- Meta Description
- Meta Keywords
- Meta Robots
 
Content
- H1 Tag
- H2 Tag
- No-followed Links
 
Link Annotations
- Canonical URL
- AMP URL
- Media Annotation URL
- Language
 
Reason to download our tool:
Free - Our tool is free of charge for everyone
Regular Updates - The tool is regularly updated to keep it up to date and even easier for everyone to use
Fast Installation - The process of installing is just a few clicks and it is 
Fast Un-installation - If you ever decide to uninstall the tool, it only takes up short while to uninstall it
Accessibility - This tool includes all the necessary tool in one browser extension 


Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs):

1. Who are we?
tinkerEdge is a boutique digital marketing agency based in Singapore. We specialize in digital performance marketing - enterprise SEO, Paid Advertising, Web Analytics & Competitive Insights, providing scalable solutions to global firms, institutes, small-medium businesses (SMBs/SMEs), and start-ups.

2. Why is this tool free?
As a growing business, we wanted to create an SEO Toolkit that can benefit our team and clients at tinkerEdge everyday.

We made this tool open source so that everyone, novice or expert can quickly conduct an SEO audit without the need for paid software. We also encourage you to provide feedback for improvements and additional features you would like to see.

3. Are there any planned updates?
We do have updates planned coming in the near future. While we're planning our next update, we're also open to suggestions for additional features to be added to our toolkit.

We would love to hear your suggestions! If there are any features you would like to see, kindly email us at info@tinkeredge.com and we'll consider them for a future update!

These are the features we have planned for the upcoming update:

Upcoming Features:
- Page load speed test
- Mobile-friendly test
- Structured data testing
